siteMetadata.description: Lab website for COCONUT Computer Club at Makassar, Indonesia

node.excerpt: eBPF is an in-kernel virtual machine, provides a high-level library, instruction set and an execution environment inside the Linux kernel. It’s used in many Linux kernel subsystems, most prominently networking, tracing, debugging and security…

frontmatter.title: A Deep Dive into eBPF: Writing an Efficient DNS Monitoring
